body_html: The sysadmin installed both cuDNN 6.0 and 7.0 and that's causing the problem. I followed #3255 but still found it necessary to insert CUDNN_LIB_DIR at the beginning of the list with library_dirs.insert(0,CUDNN_LIB_DIR) . Now, after compiling the import doesn't throw any errors, so I'm guessing it's ok.

body: The sysadmin installed both cuDNN 6.0 and 7.0 and that's causing the problem. I followed #3255 but still found it necessary to insert CUDNN_LIB_DIR at the beginning of the list with `library_dirs.insert(0,CUDNN_LIB_DIR)` . Now, after compiling the import doesn't throw any errors, so I'm guessing it's ok.
